Author: -Macaronis-
Text: The only thing thin helped me with is feeling comfortable in my own skin and being a little bit more confident. Depression will still kick your ass, especially in combination with an ED.

Author: wheelsonthebusyeah
Text: Honestly, losing weight *does* help some people in their personal happiness. I know it did for me. My mom used to be chubby in her teens, lost a ton of weight and wasn't as self conscious about her body anymore, even until today.  An ideal body *can* make someone happy/ satisfied as long as we aren't too unreasonable. It's definitely NOT everything, but don't feel bad for wanting a nice body.  If you want to lose weight, go for it. :) We are all here to support you as long as you do it in a healthy and sustainable way of course.
